attributes.action: Lets make a big difference in child poverty Today please !
attributes.additional_details:
--WE WANT TO PUT A STOP TO POVERTY AND CHILD POVERTY AND FIGHT FOR HUMAN RIGHTS! .

* More tham 800 millon go hungry everyday..

* over 1 billon people-1 in 6 people around the world live in exstreme poverty.

* every 3 seconds someone dies in poverty ..

over one millon children do not go to school because they live in poverty ..

* Every 65 saeconds someone dies of malaria

*At least half the population lives on less than 2.5 dollas a day

PLEASE HELP US TO GET THESE RIGHTS FOR HUMAN LIFE......AT LEAST SIGN THE  E-PETITION IF NOTHING ELSE.
